name: Wake Up Honey Eye Cream with Brightening Vitamin C
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is: A clinically demonstrated, brightening eye cream that rapidly reduces the appearance of dark circles, visibly depuffs, and smooths the look of fine lines with vitamin C and hydrating honey...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Circles, and Puffiness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- 3% Vitamin C (THD Ascorbate): Visibly brightens and reduces dark circles..- Encapsulated Caffeine and Upcycled Cranberry Peptide: Reduce the look of puffiness and fine lines while targeting dark circles..- Proprietary Buckwheat-Honey Blend: Provides lasting hydration and soothes skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The next best thing to a dark-circle eraser, this lightweight eye cream with potent vitamin C and hydrating honey is clinically shown to combat dark circles while visibly brightening and depuffing the eye area in minutes. Encapsulated caffeine and upcycled cranberry peptide smooth the look of crow's feet and fight wrinkles over time. This gentle formula is dermatologist tested and ophthalmologist approved...Clinical Results: In clinical testing on 35 subjects, after 1 application:.- 100% showed a brighteru00a0under-eye area..In an 8-week clinical test:.- Dark-circle color and size reduced by up to 100%.- 97% showed a reduction in puffiness...
ingredients: -3% Vitamin C (THD Ascorbate): Visibly brightens and reduces dark circles..-Encapsulated Caffeine and Upcycled Cranberry Peptide: Reduce the look of puffiness and fine lines while targeting dark circles..-Proprietary Buckwheat-Honey Blend: Provides lasting hydration and soothes skin....Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Cetearyl Olivate, Pentylene Glycol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil Unsaponifiables, Sorbitan Olivate, Boron Nitride, Caffeine, Hyaluronic Acid, Ceramide Np, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Honey Extract, Propolis Extract, Royal Jelly Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Sinensis Peel Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Fruit Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Tridecapeptide-1, Betaine, Triolein, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tocopheryl Acetate, Astaxanthin, Allantoin, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Tocopherol, Ubiquinone, Lecithin, Haematococcus Pluvialis Extract, Glyceryl Dioleate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use as the last step in your skincare routine, before SPF..-Tap and gently smooth onto eye area. .-Use morning and evening..-Safe to use around entire eye area, including eyelids...Pro tip: .-Apply under makeup for the perfect radiant base...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product..-Recycle jar, cap, inner lid, and carton. .-Please check your local recycling guidelines for info.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating, great for makeup prep, keeps my under eyes moist

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Use everyday and has overtime made my under eyes brighter significantly. Will never use a different brightening eye cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started using it but can definitely see small changes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never reacted to an eye cream like this before. I'm not exactly sure what ingredient in the formula caused me to break out but I had texture under my eyes for several days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have terrible dark circles from a mix of genetics and lack of sleep. Within a week of 2x daily use I saw a notable difference in the appearance of them. Gentle on your eyes and plenty of product for how little you need to use for application.

I didn't enjoy this cream. As it melted down it started to sting my eyes and I had to wash it off. I can't speak to how effective it is, as I didn't use it many times. I didn't like the balm-like texture, maybe just a wee bit too thick though..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this at first but it became too oily for me very quickly. I realized I would love an eye cream thatu2019s richer and less oily when applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has really helped brighten up the chronic darkness under my eyes and I love how lightweight it is. I use it in the morning under my makeup and at night under my nighttime mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i had high hopes for this eye cream. and i feel it works, but the consistency is off. it does not absorb at all. eye area will feel oily even after a few hours. if it gets onto your lashes it is even more annoying. you have to be extra careful applying it. unless your concealer can fix this wet ever-sliding texture, i don't see how it can work as a primer. it may work if you have a very dry eye area though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not a terrible product, just donu2019t notice any significant changes. Still going to finish the product but have had to go down to using it only at night as it breaks up ANY eye and under eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could, I would leave it less than one star.  I was told that it was the best thing ever when I purchased it at the store, did absolutely nothing. I ended up returning it 2 weeks later.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to lessen my dark circles and moisturize under my eye. When I use this product periodically I have no issue however when I use the product regularly I end up breaking out all under my eye and have to stop using it for a week. Honestly I never saw any improvement in my dark circles and if it got in my eye it would become irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my eyes itchy and they cry from it. Didnu2019t notice significant changes but didnu2019t use it daily either because of eye watering

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It takes away the puffiness and brightens around my eyes. I have hereditary, dark circles, and with this product on the consistent basis, I have noticed my eyes brighten up. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream is so good it took away my dark circles from my eyes

reviews.review_title: Just as good as the honey halo moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started out using the honey halo moisturizer, and absolutely loved it, so I decided to give this a try. Iu2019ve tried so many other eye creams that claim to reduce dark circles/bags/fine lines, but end up drying out my eyes or literally do absolutely nothing. For whatever reason, my left eye always gets dry and crusty, to the point that it burns. So I was looking for something that would keep my under eyes hydrated, while actually doing what it claims. This eye cream is phenomenal. After the first time I used it, I could already see a difference in my dark circles and it keeps my under eyes hydrated all day long. If youu2019re thinking about it, just get it. You wonu2019t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this cream but unfortunately something in it did not agree with my skin - my eyelids were really puffy and heavy and my eyes were red and irritated throughout the few days I used this.  I stopped using it today and my eyes feel mostly back to normal, and this was the only new product in my routine.  I've used other vitamin C products before so I'm not sure what about this I am reacting to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just started with this eye cream, but it wears under makeup like a dream.
